text: haey anak( mou ham meat) kom samlung phnek teangpir robsa anak meul towkean avei( tropy sa mb tde bony sakde) del yeung ban phdal aoy krom muoychamnuon knongchamnaom puokke( puok kmean chomnue) haey chaur anak kom pibeak chetd champoh puokke aoy saoh . haey chaur anak lomtonkay robsa anak champoh banda anak del mean chomnue choh
